Subject: Re: [archive-crawler] export heritrix2 to eclipse: download maven
 repository failed.
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=334706876

Ah, ok. It seems docbkx-maven-plugin version 2.0.3 is no longer available:

http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/com/agilejava/docbkx/docbkx-maven-plugin/

Edit engine/pom.xml and dist/pom.xml and change the docbkx-maven-plugin
version to 2.0.8, like this:

<plugin>
<groupId>com.agilejava.docbkx</groupId>
<artifactId>docbkx-maven-plugin</artifactId>
<version>2.0.8</version>

That should fix it.

Cheers,

Alex

>     Which libraries did it fail to find? You could see if running
>     maven from
>     the command-line helps (if you weren't already doing it). Change
>     to the
>     Heritrix main directory and type "mvn install". Yes, you can also try
>     manually downloading the jars. Say if "log4j 1.2.14" fails to download
>     then you should be able to just download log4j-1.2.14.jar and put
>     it in
>     ~/.m2/repository/log4j/log4j/1.2.14/.
>
>     Cheers,
>
>     Alex
